evening.name: Evening notifications
evening.title: GAME LIFE
messages: Did you gain levels today? Don't forget to note it in the app!
Did you do any activities today? Don't forget to note it in the app!
Did you gain experience today? Don't forget to note it in the app!
Did you learn something new today? Don't forget to write it down in the app!
Hey, it's almost the end of the day, did you remember to enter your activities?

message.half-time: You have half the time left to complete the task[s]: {}
message.last-time: The following task[s] are due tomorrow: {}, so hurry up and finish them!
message.today-time: The following task[s] are finished today: {}, hurry up and finish them!

server.alert-tokenexpired-text: The application will close, please restart it.
server.alert-adempty-text: You have no more ads available for today.

onboarding.page1: Welcome to Game-Life, the logbook that turns you into a video game character!
onboarding.page2: Note your activities in the application to increase your avatar's experience and level!
onboarding.page3: Deviens meilleur chaque jour, seul ou avec tes amis !

conditions.St: Wait for level {} with the statistic "{}"

activity.alert-remove-text: Are you sure you want to eliminate this activity?
activity.alert-wrongtimindg-text: The selected activity how or ends during another.
activity.alert-remcomment-text: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
activity.timeralert-cancel-text: Are you sure you want to cancel this activity?

dailyquest.daily-define-text: Enter 2 categories in which you want to improve
dailyquest.quest-main-text: One hour and a half of activity in the following categories:
dailyquest.quest-bonus-text: One quarter hour in the following category:
dailyquest.alert-info-text:
Daily quests are a way for you to get extra experience.

There are 3 categories in the daily quests:


1- The hour and a half of activity: you have 1h30 of "mandatory" activity per day.
1 hour of activity of your choice, you can choose to complete this hour by doing 1 or 2 activities (of different categories).
If you complete your hour of activity, you gain +1% of xp for the next day (can be accumulated 21 times)
If you fail, you will get -5% of xp for the next day (not cumulative)


2- (Finished soon) A list of habits you want to start / continue.
You can decide to add up to 5 habits at the same time.
If you achieve your quarter of an hour of activity taken at random, you gain +0,5% of xp for the next day (cumulative 10 times)
If you fail, nothing happens.


3- (Available soon) A button to watch a commercial. Watching one earns you points (and later virtual currency). You can earn titles and other bonuses from a certain number of ads watched!
dailyquest.alert-same-text: You cannot choose the same skill twice
dailyquest.alert-warn-text: You can only change the skills for the daily quests once a day
dailyquest.alert-tasknotitle-text: Please enter a title for your task
dailyquest.alert-taskremove-text: You have already checked this task, press no to uncheck it, or yes to delete it

home.alert-update-text: An update of the application is available
home.alert-newversion-text: You are on a version not available to the public, the online features are disabled until the official release
home.alert-exit-text: Do you want to leave the application?
home.alert-dateerror-text: It seems that you changed the date, maybe in order to cheat? I hope it won't happen again ^^

leaderboard.alert-onlineneed-text: A connection is required to access the ranking!
leaderboard.alert-connectneed-text: To appear in the ranking, log in by entering your email address in the 'Identity' page.

login.page-text: Hello to you, player of your own life, come and join the LVL-UP community
login.input-cgu-text: I have read and agree to the %.
login.error-login-nonmail: Please enter a valid email address.
login.error-signin-pseudoUsed: This username is already in use.
login.error-signin-pseudoIncorrect: This username is incorrect (4-24 characters, no insults...).
login.error-signin-disagree: Please accept the terms and conditions.
login.alert-limitAccount-text: You can't create more than 3 accounts with one device.
login.alert-limitDevice-title: Too many devices on this account
login.alert-limitDevice-text: You can't have more than 5 devices connected to a single account.
login.alert-deviceRemoved-text: Your device has been removed from your account because you already have the maximum number of devices on this account.

multiplayer.connection-offline: Please connect to the internet and restart the application to access this page.
multiplayer.connection-failed: The connection to the server failed, please try again later.

profile.alert-nowifi-text: You must be connected to the internet to be able to modify your profile, if you are already connected to the internet restart the application
profile.alert-usernamewarning-text: You can only change your username once every {} days, so choose wisely!
profile.alert-alreadyUsed-text: This username is already in use, please choose another one.
profile.alert-alreadyChanged-text: You must wait {} days before you can change it again.
profile.alert-incorrect-text: Your username must be between 4 and 24 characters long, and must not contain any insulting words.
profile.alert-birthtimewarning-text: You can only set a birth date once every {} days, so choose wisely!
profile.alert-birthtimewait-text: You must wait {} days before you can change your date of birth again.

profile-avatar.alert-isequipped-text: You must equip another item in order to sell this one.
profile-avatar.alert-confirmsell-text: Are you sure you want to sell this item?

report.type-activity-text: You can suggest an activity here
report.type-suggest-text: Any suggestion about the application? Share your idea here
report.type-bug-text: Have you seen a bug? Please bring us as much details about it as possible
report.type-message-text: Do you have a message for us? Please send it here
report.alert-buginfo-text: Please provide as many details as possible about the nature of the bug and the conditions in which it occurred (android/ios? Connected to internet or not? Brand of the smartphone or emulator ? etc)
report.alert-error-text: An error has occurred, please try again later.

settings.alert-disconnect-text: Do you want to log out? Data will only be saved locally
settings.alert-disconnecterror-text: An error has occurred, please check your internet connection or please try again later.
settings.alert-deleteaccount-text: Are you sure you want to delete your account? A confirmation email will be sent to you.
settings.alert-deletedmailsent-text: A confirmation email has been sent to you, check your mailbox.
settings.alert-deletedmailtooearly-text: A confirmation email has already been sent to you, please wait a few minutes before sending one, check your mailbox.
settings.alert-deletedfailed-text: The email was not sent, please check your internet connection or try again later.

shop.alert-code-text:
You can win codes by:
	- Playing on our Discord server
	- Finding codes in our Tiktok and Youtube videos
	- Winning a contest on Instagram or Twitter
shop.reward-failed-text: An error has occurred, please try again later.
shop.reward-wrong-text: The code you entered is incorrect.

shopItems.error-no-titles: An error occurred while loading the securities for sale, please try again later.
shopItems.error-no-items: An error occurred while loading the items for sale, please try again later.
shopItems.error-inventory-empty: You do not have any items

skills.text-empty: Add an activity, the associated skills will appear here

descriptions.int: Intelligence is a very broad statistic, as soon as you use your brain, you train it and therefore gain intelligence points. The main skills to gain intelligence are school work and thinking work.
descriptions.soc: Social competence is a skill that increases when you do activities with other people. For example, team sports or going out with friends.
descriptions.for: Strength is a fairly simple statistic, it increases by doing skills that require it, like bodybuilding, sports or physical jobs for example!
descriptions.end: Stamina is probably the skill that you will improve the fastest! This is a key statistic that improves in almost all sports!
descriptions.agi: Agility is probably the longest statistic to build, it is not often required and improves slowly, the best ways to increase your agility are actis like stretching or yoga.
descriptions.dex: Dexterity is the agility of the fingers, so it improves a lot on precision tasks, writing tasks on a computer or even with musical instruments.

task.error-title-exists: A task with this title already exists

task.alert-remtask-text: Are you sure you want to delete this task?

tasks.alert-taskslimit-text: You have reached the limit of tasks, please delete some of them to add more.

An email has been sent to you to authorize your device to connect.

The email may be sent after a few minutes, check your spam.
